markdownRemark.html:
As a nearly semester-long project for a distributed systems class, we were to impliment a distributed filesystem called YFS, based on an MIT 6.824 project Below I’ll outline the good, bad, and ugly about the project, as well as some lessons I learned.

COMING SOON
